title: X Factor: Celebrity fans left stunned by Jenny Ryan’s incredible transformation
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

X Factor: Celebrity fans were left stunned by Jenny Ryan’s incredible transformation as she returned to the competition following huge public demand.

The Chase quizzer hit the stage in a sparkling silver dress with her hair slicked back, just one week after being told to go home during the audition rounds.

Jenny proved her fans faith in her was not wasted as she took to the stage for Saturday’s first live show, belting out a powerful rendition of Eurovision star Conchita's “Rise Like A Phoenix”.

While her booming vocals were more than enough to send the judges wild, it was her completely new look that left everyone in a spin.

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

Looking a world away from her alter ego ‘The Vixen’, Jenny looked almost unrecognisable from her teatime tele persona.

Fans immediately rushed to Twitter to praise the 37-year-old, with one fan commenting: “She went from the vixen to Jenny from the block!”

Another quipped: “Why have they made Jenny Ryan look NOTHING like Jenny Ryan??”

A third described the professional quizzer as an “icon”.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

The Chaser previously revealed that she could not remember much of her audition because her alter ego essentially took over her body.

Speaking about stepping out during last weekend’s audition, she claimed: “It was the Vixen who pushed me out of the door.

"From that point I don't actually remember what happened, when I see the episode it will be like watching it for the first time."

Jenny was originally booted off The X Factor : Celebrity during the audition stages.

Her shock exit was met with national outrage, forcing bosses to invite her back for the live shows.

The first contestants to be eliminated were American chat show host Ricki Lake and Love Actually star Olivia Olson.

description: The 37-year-old quizzer showcased her powerful voice on the first live show with a rendition of Eurovision star Conchita's 'Rise Like A Phoenix'
